title: Between
description: Twelve years ago the angels fell in heaps of broken bone and blood. Cassie Larke watched them fall, and now the world is a dark and lonely place. She's discovered a mysterious stranger adrift at sea and she believes he may be a surviving angel, and the key to finding out what happened in Heaven. The key to the doors between the worlds has been lost, and Cassie and her friends must find it before it falls into the wrong hands.Heaven wants in, Hell wants out. Who will stand up for those Between?
author: A.R. DeClerck
